article.headline: Louisiana-Monroe 77, Arkansas State 69
article.story: MONROE, La. (AP) -- Tony Hooper scored 26 points to help Louisiana-Monroe beat Arkansas State 77-69 Thursday night. The victory puts the Warhawks (10-6, 4-0 Sun Belt Conference ) in sole possession of first place in the league. The win also moves Louisiana-Monroe to 7-0 at home this year. Arkansas State (7-9, 2-2) built an 8-2 lead before the Warhawks hit their stride. Louisiana-Monroe outscored ASU 9-0 over the next four minutes to take an 11-8 lead. During that stretch, the defense stepped up, holding ASU to 0-for-1 from the field with four turnovers. ULM used strong shooting from Jordan Payne and Hooper -- who scored a combined 27 points in the first half -- to build a 40-22 halftime lead. In the second half ASU cut the Warhawk lead to four points with 5:42 remaining in the game. But Hooper stepped up, pouring in five straight points to push the Warhawk lead back over ten points at the four-minute mark. ASU was able to pull as close as six points in the final minutes of the game, but 5-of-6 free throw shooting from the Warhawks iced the game for ULM. Payne scored 17 points for Louisiana-Monroe, Brandon Roberts added 11. Arkansas State was led offensively by Adrian Banks 22 points.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).
